document.heading: Department of Health Enabling Act of 2023
document.preamble: At a duly called Regular Meeting of the Council held this 20th day of September, 2023, the following Resolution and Law were adopted.

recital.text: the Council is vested with the authority to enact laws and Budget Resolutions pursuant to Article VII, Section 4(a) of the Constitution of the Upper Mattaponi Tribe ("Constitution"); and,
the Constitution establishes two Departments under the Executive Branch of government and allows the Council to establish other Departments by law; and,

the Council finds that establishing a Department of Health will assist the Tribe in assessing and implementing various health care programs in a well-coordinated and collaborative manner that will enhance educational awareness, disease prevention, and healthy behavioral change.

recital.conjunction: NOW THEREFORE IT BE IT RESOLVED
recital.text: that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH ENABLING ACT OF 2023".

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on September 20, 2023, at a Regular Meeting with a vote of 4 in favor and 0 opposed, 1 abstaining, and 1 absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Constitution of the Tribe.

codify:insert.codified:doc: Upper Mattaponi Tribal Code of Law

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the Department of Health Enabling Act ("Act").

codify:insert.codified:doc: Upper Mattaponi Tribal Code of Law

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of the Act is to establish the Department of Health.

codify:insert.codified:doc: Upper Mattaponi Tribal Code of Law

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: reorganizing the structure of governmental departments and programs in accordance with the Constitution will promote efficiency within the Tribe; and,

establishing a Department of Health within the executive branch of government will assist the Tribe in managing, administering, and evaluating various health care programs for the benefit of citizens of the Tribe.

codify:insert.codified:doc: Upper Mattaponi Tribal Code of Law

section.heading: Organization of the Department of Health

para.text: The Chief shall have the authority to organize and operate the Department of Health in an efficient and fiscally sound manner in accordance with the size, scope, and funding of the various programs, services, and other activities that are assigned to the Department of Health from time to time.
The Department of Health may include the following programs, services, and activities:

text.em: Public Health Nursing and Other Services
Any other program or service established by the Chief, subject to ratification by the Council.

codify:insert.codified:doc: Upper Mattaponi Tribal Code of Law

section.heading: Department of Health Goals and Objectives
section.text: The mission of the Department of Health is to assess and implement various health care programs of the Tribe in a well-coordinated and collaborative manner that will enhance educational awareness, disease prevention, and healthy behavioral changes. The primary goal of the Department of Health is to provide comprehensive health care awareness that will target multiple dimensions of health such as physical, mental, emotional, and social needs of citizens of the Tribe of all ages.

section.heading: Authority to Operate and Administer the Department of Health

para.text: The Chief, and any person(s) designated by the Chief and working at the direction of the Chief, shall have the authority to operate and manage the Department of Health and/or any portion or component of the Department of Health.
